page.title: 03HOLIDAYS
page.content: People in our area spend their holidays in different places.Many people go{abroad}by plane. They go for the sunshine.Others{stay at home and most go to the seaside.Some go to the Lake District,Scotland and Wales for the scenery and they go on walks,hikes or drive round.They go on holiday by car and some take a caravan to stay in .They dont always go to the same resort euery year because they want to try out new resorts. Most people go on holiday in the summer and will stay in one of these places a static caravan, motor home, rented house, flat, tent or hotel. However most people in our area are{farmers}and they dont get chance to go on holiday in summer because the farmer is busy milking, haymaking and silaging. If they do get a holiday it is at a less busy time of the year.
